item.description: We meet at the Train Bridge and walk to the Herring Run and back, it's a great 7 mile stroll....We do it at a pretty good pace, mostly because we want to get to Mark Anthony's for beers and snacks after...I've been getting a lot of positive feedback from the past two outings, and requests from folks who haven't been able to make it, so let's do it again!
item.how_to_find_us: The parking lot is directly accross the street from Buzzards Bay Antique Center, which is at 61 Main Street, Buzzards Bay

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Canal Walk and Snacks at Mark Anthony's
